name: Witch runner
description:
The witch was a bad girl. Time to finally catch and punish her. You will become a knight who has been chasing a charming witch for a long time. Your path was through time and obstacles. Be fast and brave. This confrontation has been going on for too long. Aren't you done yet? It's about time!

Different periods of time, good music and a charming witch are waiting for you.

We used the skybox asset and several animations from the Mixamo site.

Authors:

1) Aleksey Aristov (tahoma.droid@gmail.com)
